Telarix Inc.|Vienna, VA|On Site Full Time

Telarix is a leading provider of interconnect and settlement software solutions to telecom communication service providers (“CSPs”) worldwide.

Telarix has the following open full-time positions open: • Mid-Level Java Developer • Mid-Level Software Developer • Entry Level Developer

Go to our website for more details: http://www.telarix.com/Company/telarix-job-openings.html
